channel.title: Gameframe
channel.description: How do I change the gameframe on a pi server from 317 with nothing on it to a 474 with hp and prayer? is it in cache? and how do I make the icon work?

item.title: Gameframe
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

scar3d:

How do I change the gameframe on a pi server from 317 with nothing on it to a 474 with hp and prayer? is it in cache? and how do I make the icon work?

This would be my way:

Downloading all the new sprites basing on a 474,
Re-packing the cache using Tom’s cache suit,
Getting an Interface editor… l3l
adding the codes for the sprites (Making the client read the sprites in a specific directory …)
Adding newer Animations…
Changing The Walk, stand anims etc.

for prayer you need to add cases n’ shit, i would recommend you, if you want to skip that all, just download an already set 474

Read full topic
